name: Load Verify
overview:
Load Verify provide a load testing service.

Load Verify can load test web applications from simple websites to full SAAS products. They provide the tools, the scripting and the expertise to get an accurate load test fast.

No need to waste time evaluating and learning new load testing tools that you hardly ever use. Load Verify can load test any functionality supported by a modern browser because thatâ€™s what is used to generate the traffic. The browsers can simulate tens of thousands of concurrent users very cost effectively.
